meanings.definition: The grounds and buildings of a university or college.
meanings.sent1: The campus has many buildings where students go to learn.
meanings.sent2: I walk through the campus every day to get to my classes.
meanings.sent3: The campus looked like a small city with all its buildings and pathways.
meanings.sent4: The campus was a bustling hub of activity, like a beehive of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The campus was so vast, it felt like a maze of knowledge waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: The area of land and buildings around a school or other institution.
meanings.sent1: The school campus includes the playground and the classrooms.
meanings.sent2: Students enjoy playing games on the campus during recess.
meanings.sent3: The campus seemed to stretch on forever, like a never-ending playground.
meanings.sent4: The campus was a protective shield around the school, keeping it safe.
meanings.sent5: The campus was a vibrant community where learning and fun intertwined.
